desmoj.core.simulator

Class RealTimeEventWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.RealTimeEventWrapper

  • public class RealTimeEventWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the basic frame for user defined events. Derive from this class to design special real time external events for a model. To use real time external events, always create a new object of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RealTimeEventWrapper(ExternalEvent externalEvent)
      Creates an real time wrapper for an external event.
      RealTimeEventWrapper(ExternalEvent externalEvent, long nanoTimeStamp)
      Creates an real time wrapper for an external event.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getNanos()
      Returns the nanosecond timestamp associated with the encapsulated ExternalEvent.
      void realTimeSchedule()
      Schedules the external event to happen at the simulation time equivalent to the nanosecond timestamp of this RealTimeEventWrapper.
      void setNanos(long nanos)
      Sets the nanosecond timestamp of this RealTimeEventWrapper.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RealTimeEventWrapper

        public RealTimeEventWrapper(ExternalEvent externalEvent)
        Creates an real time wrapper for an external event. This constructor will set the nanosecond timestamp to the current value of System.nanoTime().

      • RealTimeEventWrapper

        public RealTimeEventWrapper(ExternalEvent externalEvent,
                            long nanoTimeStamp)
        Creates an real time wrapper for an external event.

    • Method Detail

      • realTimeSchedule

        public void realTimeSchedule()
        Schedules the external event to happen at the simulation time equivalent to the nanosecond timestamp of this RealTimeEventWrapper.

      • setNanos

        public void setNanos(long nanos)
        Sets the nanosecond timestamp of this RealTimeEventWrapper. Use method System.nanoTime() to get a time stamp.

      • getNanos

        public long getNanos()
        Returns the nanosecond timestamp associated with the encapsulated ExternalEvent. *
